message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90%, you take 10%. We can always renegotiate later.
I'm willing to give you a bigger share, but I think 60% is a fair starting point. Your turn to negotiate!
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 70/30. We can't keep going back and forth forever, and I'm sure we can both agree that a deal is better than nothing.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I think 68% is still too much. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer 72/28. Let's see if we can find a middle ground.
